name: Nightfall (Spring 2023 Jam)
description:
During "Day", you avoid the funny cubes by teleporting away.
During "Night", you can deal damage by teleporting into them.

WASD to move (slightly)
Left Mouse to Teleport
Esq to Quit

Runs on Windows right now

I wanted to see how much I could do in a week from programing to arts, sounds, etc.
I originally planned to do more, but my Unreal project exploded my laptop.

Made with Unreal and Blender
